title: Why Red Bull resurgence could be real - What to watch at 2025 Azerbaijan GP
summary: From Red Bull's potential resurgence to McLaren's title duel, tyre strategy gambles, Bearman's race-ban threat and renewed scrutiny on driving rules, Baku promises another weekend of intrigue

qa_pairs.question: Which team is currently recognized for its potential resurgence in the 2025 season?
What key factor in race strategy could significantly impact team performance at the Baku GP?
Which team is mentioned as being in a title duel alongside Red Bull?
